description: An IBM Cloud Schematics template to launch an HPC (High Performance Computing) cluster for FSS (Financial Services Sector) Tech Preview.
name: IBM Spectrum Symphony CWS LSF Cluster Template hpc-fss-cluster

metadata.displayName: IBM Spectrum Symphony CWS LSF Cluster Template hpc-fss-cluster
metadata.longDescription: An IBM Cloud Schematics template to launch an HPC (High Performance Computing) cluster for FSS (Financial Services Sector) Tech Preview. Schematics uses Terraform as the infrastructure as code engine. With this template, you can provision and manage infrastructure as a single unit.

bullets.title: Software Deployed
bullets.description: IBM Spectrum Symphony/CWS/LSF Cluster on Schematics

bullets.title: Supported Product Version
bullets.description: Symphony latest (7.2.0.x), CWS latest (2.2.0.x), LSF latest (10.1)

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description: To create the resources that this template requests, your IBM Cloud Infrastructure (Softlayer) account and IBM Cloud account must have sufficient permissions.
